text: The Lifan X80 is a Chinese four-door SUV produced by the Lifan Motors division of Lifan Group. == History == Lifan X80 front Lifan X80 rear In November 2016, the Lifan X80 debuted at the 2016 Guangzhou Auto Show. In March 2017, the Lifan X80 was launched. Only one engine was offered at launch. A 2.0 litre turbo-charged petrol engine capable of producing 191hp and 286nm of torque. There was two transmissions offered: a 6-speed manual gearbox or a 6-speed automatic gearbox. == References == Category:Mid-size sport utility vehicles X80 Category:Cars introduced in 2016 Category:2010s cars Category:Cars of China
title: Lifan X80
